content.text:
# Prime Command

Crucible project overview and context for efficient development.

## Usage
`/prime [focus]`

## Actions

### Overview (default)
- **Core architecture**: Agent system, workflow engine, tools
- **Key directories**: src/, agents/, docs/, specs/
- **Development workflow**: Git flow, testing, deployment
- **Current status**: Branches, recent changes, blocking issues

### Debug
- **Error patterns**: Common issues and solutions
- **Debug workflow**: Logs, breakpoints, testing
- **Component dependencies**: What affects what
- **Test coverage**: Gaps and priorities

### Feature Integration
- **Integration points**: Where new features connect
- **Architecture constraints**: What works/doesn't work
- **Performance considerations**: Bottlenecks and optimizations
- **Testing requirements**: What needs coverage

### Code Quality
- **Style guide**: Crucible conventions
- **Type safety**: TypeScript patterns
- **Error handling**: Rust patterns and Result types
- **Performance**: Hotspots and monitoring

## Examples
```
/prime            # Project overview
/prime debug      # Debug workflow
/prime feature    # Feature integration guide
/prime quality    # Code quality standards
```

Leverages Crucible-specific knowledge for efficient development decisions.
I'll provide a comprehensive overview of the Crucible project to help with efficient development.

1‚Üí# üî• Crucible
     2‚Üí
     3‚Üí> Where ideas transform through linked thinking
     4‚Üí
     5‚ÜíA knowledge management system that combines the zooming interface of Workflowy, the extensibility of Obsidian, and AI agent integration to create a platform for organizing and connecting ideas. Crucible promotes **linked thinking** - the seamless connection and evolution of ideas across time and context.
     6‚Üí
     7‚Üí## Features
     8‚Üí
     9‚Üí- üîç **Infinite Zoom**: Navigate your knowledge at any scale with smooth transitions
    10‚Üí- üß¨ **CRDT-based**: Real-time sync without conflicts, enabling collaborative thinking
    11‚Üí- üé® **Canvas Mode**: Spatial organization of ideas with visual connections
    12‚Üí- ü§ñ **AI Agent Integration**: Your knowledge becomes agentic through MCP and A2A protocols
    13‚Üí- üîå **Plugin System**: Extend with Rune scripts and custom behaviors
    14‚Üí- üîó **Visual Programming**: Node-based workflow builder for agent orchestration
    15‚Üí- ‚ö° **High Performance**: Rust core with GPU acceleration for responsive interactions
    16‚Üí- üß† **Linked Thinking**: Ideas connect, evolve, and generate new insights automatically
    17‚Üí
    18‚Üí## Quick Start
    19‚Üí
    20‚Üí```bash
    21‚Üí# Clone the repository
    22‚Üígit clone https://github.com/matthewkrohn/crucible.git
    23‚Üícd crucible
    24‚Üí
    25‚Üí# Run setup script
    26‚Üí./scripts/setup.sh
    27‚Üí
    28‚Üí# Start development
    29‚Üípnpm dev
    30‚Üí```
    31‚Üí
    32‚Üí## Tech Stack
    33‚Üí
    34‚Üí- **Core**: Rust + Tauri
    35‚Üí- **Frontend**: Svelte 5 + TypeScript
    36‚Üí- **Database**: PGlite with pgvector
    37‚Üí- **CRDT**: Yrs
    38‚Üí- **Scripting**: Rune
    39‚Üí
    40‚Üí## Documentation
    41‚Üí
    42‚Üí- **[Architecture](./ARCHITECTURE.md)** - Complete system architecture and design principles
    43‚Üí- **[Specifications](./specs/)** - Technical specs organized by tech stack and sprint phases
    44‚Üí- **[Agent System](./AGENTS.md)** - AI agent integration, code generation, and tooling
    45‚Üí- **[Roadmap](./crucible-roadmap.md)** - Development phases and timeline
    46‚Üí- **[Gap Analysis](./specs/GAP_ANALYSIS_COMPREHENSIVE.md)** - Comprehensive analysis of implementation gaps and context engineering needs
    47‚Üí
    48‚Üí### Specification Structure
    49‚Üí
    50‚Üí```
    51‚Üíspecs/
    52‚Üí‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ rust-core/         # Core business logic and CRDT operations
    53‚Üí‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ tauri-backend/     # Desktop application backend
    54‚Üí‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ svelte-frontend/   # UI components and user experience
    55‚Üí‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ database/          # Persistence and vector search
    56‚Üí‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ plugin-system/     # Extensibility and Rune runtime
    57‚Üí‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ mcp-integration/   # AI agent tools and protocols
    58‚Üí‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ code-generation/   # Agent code generation specifications
    59‚Üí‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ data-specs/        # Schemas and type definitions
    60‚Üí‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ sprint-{1,2,3,4}/  # Implementation phases
    61‚Üí```
    62‚Üí
    63‚Üí### Sprint Phases
    64‚Üí
    65‚Üí- **Sprint 1**: Foundation (CRDT + Basic UI) - *[See detailed specs](./specs/sprint-1/)*
    66‚Üí- **Sprint 2**: Persistence & UI Polish - *[See detailed specs](./specs/sprint-2/)*
    67‚Üí- **Sprint 3**: Canvas & Properties - *[See detailed specs](./specs/sprint-3/)*
    68‚Üí- **Sprint 4**: Intelligence Layer - *[See detailed specs](./specs/sprint-4/)*
    69‚Üí
    70‚Üí### Key Specifications
    71‚Üí
    72‚Üí- **[Agent Code Generation](./specs/code-generation/)** - AI agent specifications for automated code generation
    73‚Üí- **[A2A Protocol Integration](./specs/sprint-4/a2a-protocol-feature.md)** - Agent-to-agent communication protocols
    74‚Üí- **[Gap Analysis](./specs/GAP_ANALYSIS_COMPREHENSIVE.md)** - Comprehensive analysis of implementation gaps and context engineering needs
    75‚Üí
    76‚Üí## License
    77‚Üí
    78‚ÜíMIT OR Apache-2.0
    79‚Üí
    80‚Üí

file.content:
# üî• Crucible

> Where ideas transform through linked thinking

A knowledge management system that combines the zooming interface of Workflowy, the extensibility of Obsidian, and AI agent integration to create a platform for organizing and connecting ideas. Crucible promotes **linked thinking** - the seamless connection and evolution of ideas across time and context.

## Features

- üîç **Infinite Zoom**: Navigate your knowledge at any scale with smooth transitions
- üß¨ **CRDT-based**: Real-time sync without conflicts, enabling collaborative thinking
- üé® **Canvas Mode**: Spatial organization of ideas with visual connections
- ü§ñ **AI Agent Integration**: Your knowledge becomes agentic through MCP and A2A protocols
- üîå **Plugin System**: Extend with Rune scripts and custom behaviors
- üîó **Visual Programming**: Node-based workflow builder for agent orchestration
- ‚ö° **High Performance**: Rust core with GPU acceleration for responsive interactions
- üß† **Linked Thinking**: Ideas connect, evolve, and generate new insights automatically

## Quick Start

```bash
# Clone the repository
git clone https://github.com/matthewkrohn/crucible.git
cd crucible

# Run setup script
./scripts/setup.sh

# Start development
pnpm dev
```

## Tech Stack

- **Core**: Rust + Tauri
- **Frontend**: Svelte 5 + TypeScript
- **Database**: PGlite with pgvector
- **CRDT**: Yrs
- **Scripting**: Rune

## Documentation

- **[Architecture](./ARCHITECTURE.md)** - Complete system architecture and design principles
- **[Specifications](./specs/)** - Technical specs organized by tech stack and sprint phases
- **[Agent System](./AGENTS.md)** - AI agent integration, code generation, and tooling
- **[Roadmap](./crucible-roadmap.md)** - Development phases and timeline
- **[Gap Analysis](./specs/GAP_ANALYSIS_COMPREHENSIVE.md)** - Comprehensive analysis of implementation gaps and context engineering needs

### Specification Structure

```
specs/
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ rust-core/         # Core business logic and CRDT operations
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ tauri-backend/     # Desktop application backend
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ svelte-frontend/   # UI components and user experience
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ database/          # Persistence and vector search
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ plugin-system/     # Extensibility and Rune runtime
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ mcp-integration/   # AI agent tools and protocols
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ code-generation/   # Agent code generation specifications
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ data-specs/        # Schemas and type definitions
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ sprint-{1,2,3,4}/  # Implementation phases
```

### Sprint Phases

- **Sprint 1**: Foundation (CRDT + Basic UI) - *[See detailed specs](./specs/sprint-1/)*
- **Sprint 2**: Persistence & UI Polish - *[See detailed specs](./specs/sprint-2/)*
- **Sprint 3**: Canvas & Properties - *[See detailed specs](./specs/sprint-3/)*
- **Sprint 4**: Intelligence Layer - *[See detailed specs](./specs/sprint-4/)*

### Key Specifications

- **[Agent Code Generation](./specs/code-generation/)** - AI agent specifications for automated code generation
- **[A2A Protocol Integration](./specs/sprint-4/a2a-protocol-feature.md)** - Agent-to-agent communication protocols
- **[Gap Analysis](./specs/GAP_ANALYSIS_COMPREHENSIVE.md)** - Comprehensive analysis of implementation gaps and context engineering needs

## License

MIT OR Apache-2.0

     2‚Üíresolver = "2"
     3‚Üímembers = [
     4‚Üí    "crates/crucible-core",
     5‚Üí    "crates/crucible-tauri",
     6‚Üí    "crates/crucible-mcp",
     7‚Üí    "crates/crucible-plugins",
     8‚Üí]

    10‚Üí[workspace.package]
    11‚Üíversion = "0.1.0"
    12‚Üíauthors = ["Matthew Krohn <matthew.d.krohn@gmail.com>"]
    13‚Üílicense = "MIT OR Apache-2.0"
    14‚Üíedition = "2021"
    15‚Üírust-version = "1.75"
    16‚Üí

    20‚Üíserde = { version = "1.0", features = ["derive"] }

    26‚Üítauri = { version = "2.0", features = [] }

file.content:
[workspace]
resolver = "2"
members = [
    "crates/crucible-core",
    "crates/crucible-tauri",
    "crates/crucible-mcp",
    "crates/crucible-plugins",
]

[workspace.package]
version = "0.1.0"
authors = ["Matthew Krohn <matthew.d.krohn@gmail.com>"]
license = "MIT OR Apache-2.0"
edition = "2021"
rust-version = "1.75"

[workspace.dependencies]
yrs = "0.18"
tokio = { version = "1.35", features = ["full"] }
serde = { version = "1.0", features = ["derive"] }
serde_json = "1.0"
uuid = { version = "1.6", features = ["v4", "serde"] }
anyhow = "1.0"
thiserror = "1.0"
rune = "0.13"
tauri = { version = "2.0", features = [] }

     2‚Üí  "name": "crucible",
     3‚Üí  "version": "0.1.0",
     4‚Üí  "private": true,
     5‚Üí  "scripts": {
     6‚Üí    "dev": "pnpm --filter desktop dev",
     7‚Üí    "build": "pnpm run build:rust && pnpm run build:js",
     8‚Üí    "build:rust": "cargo build --release",
     9‚Üí    "build:js": "pnpm --filter '*' build",
    10‚Üí    "test": "pnpm run test:rust && pnpm run test:js",
    11‚Üí    "test:rust": "cargo test",
    12‚Üí    "test:js": "pnpm --filter '*' test",

file.content:
#!/usr/bin/env bash
set -e

echo "üî• Setting up Crucible development environment..."

# Check requirements
command -v cargo >/dev/null 2>&1 || { echo "Rust is required. Install from https://rustup.rs"; exit 1; }
command -v pnpm >/dev/null 2>&1 || { echo "pnpm is required. Install with: npm i -g pnpm"; exit 1; }
command -v node >/dev/null 2>&1 || { echo "Node.js 20+ is required."; exit 1; }

# Install Rust dependencies
echo "üì¶ Installing Rust dependencies..."
cargo fetch

# Install JS dependencies
echo "üì¶ Installing JavaScript dependencies..."
pnpm install

# Setup git hooks
echo "üîó Setting up git hooks..."
pnpm dlx husky install

# Build core crates
echo "üî® Building core crates..."
cargo build --workspace

echo "‚úÖ Setup complete! Run 'pnpm dev' to start developing."

content.text:
# Crucible Project Overview

## Core Architecture
- **Knowledge Management System**: Combines Workflowy's zooming interface with Obsidian's extensibility
- **Tech Stack**: Rust core + Tauri backend, Svelte 5 + TypeScript frontend
- **CRDT-based**: Real-time sync using Yrs library
- **AI Integration**: MCP and A2A protocols for agent orchestration
- **Scripting**: Rune runtime for plugins and extensions

## Key Directories
- **crates/**: Rust workspace with 4 core modules (core, tauri, mcp, plugins)
- **packages/**: JS workspace with desktop, shared, and web packages
- **specs/**: 18 technical specifications organized by sprint phases
- **docs/**: Architecture documentation and feature specs
- **plugins/**: Example plugins and extensions

## Development Workflow
- **Setup**: `./scripts/setup.sh` handles Rust/JS deps and git hooks
- **Development**: `pnpm dev` starts development server
- **Build**: `pnpm build` for both Rust and JS
- **Testing**: `pnpm test` runs both Rust and JS test suites
- **Linting**: `pnpm lint` across all packages

## Current Status
- **Branch**: Clean master branch (0946138)
- **Recent Focus**: Visual node editor, agent workflows, rune syntax
- **Phase**: Sprint 4 - Intelligence Layer implementation
- **Blocking Issues**: None identified

## Integration Points
- **CRDT Layer**: yrs for conflict-free data sync
- **Database**: PGlite with pgvector for semantic search
- **Agent System**: MCP tools and A2A protocols
- **UI Components**: Svelte 5 with reactive canvas system
- **Plugin System**: Rune scripts for extensibility

## Key Commands
```bash
pnpm dev          # Start development
pnpm build        # Build all components
pnpm test         # Run tests
cargo build       # Rust-specific build
./scripts/setup.sh # Initial setup
```
